::KitKat::

She turned and saw Rowdy standing on the shore line of the 
pool. "Stringtra! YOu OK? What's going on?" She paddled and tried 
again to cut the arm that held Stringtra.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@h...> 
wrote:
> Rowdy Wolf:
> 
> 
> Rowdy Wolf ducked his head, looking at the dark waters. He knew he 
couldn't 
> swim. In his home in cold climates he never found the need to swim 
in the 
> small lakes. He whimpered seeing Stingtra. He didn't know what to 
make of 
> the snake-like arm that had her and threw her.
> 
> He stepped forward, putting his paw into the water, but found that 
it was 
> only about one inch deep.
>
